task.title: Viewing OAuth profiles by using the command line
task.shortdesc: System administrators can view OAuth profiles by using the list OAuthProfile, and show OAuthProfile commands on the command line.

context.p: You can view OAuth profiles by using the command line, or by using the . For more information about using the to view OAuth profiles, see .

step.cmd: To view all OAuth profiles, enter the following command:
To view a specific OAuth profile, enter the following command:
step.info:
show OAuthProfile "Name=name"Where:
name Specifies the name of the OAuth profile that you want to view.
